<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Make sure that there is only one column in sys_cs_topic with display=true</description>
        <name>Set sys_cs_topic.title display to False</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addEncodedQuery('name=sys_cs_topic^element=name^ORelement=title');
	gr.orderBy('element');
	gr.query();
	gr.next();
	//check the display property of 'name' column
	var nameDisplay = gr.getDisplayValue('display');
	//set the display property of 'title' column
	if (gr.next()) {
         if (nameDisplay === 'true') {
             gr.setValue('display', 'false');
             gr.update();
         }
	}
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
